briefdescription.para: Create a description of a Shape.

parameterdescription.para: The number of elements of the Tile Shape in the x-axis
The number of elements of the Tile Shape in the y-axis
The number of elements of the Tile Shape in the z-axis

simplesect.para: A TTL_shape_t describing in Tile Shape requested.

briefdescription.para: Create a 2D Description of a Tile Shape.

detaileddescription.para:
TTL_shape_t for more information.
width
The number of elements of the Tile Shape in the x-axis
height
The number of elements of the Tile Shape in the y-axis
depth defaults to 1

simplesect.para: A TTL_shape_t describing in Tile Shape requested.

briefdescription.para: Create a 1D Description of a Tile Shape.

detaileddescription.para:
TTL_shape_t for more information.
width
The number of elements of the Tile Shape in the x-axis
height and depth default to 1

simplesect.para: A TTL_shape_t describing in Tile Shape requested.

briefdescription.para: A Shape is empty if its width is 0.

simplesect.para: x, y, z expressed as a TTL_offset_dim_t
x, y, z = 0 expressed as a TTL_offset_dim_t
x, y = 0, z = 0 expressed as a TTL_offset_dim_t
x = 0, y = 0, z = 0 expressed as a TTL_offset_dim_t

memberdef.argsstring: (const TTL_overlap_dim_t width, const TTL_overlap_dim_t height, const TTL_overlap_dim_t depth)
memberdef.name: TTL_create_overlap

briefdescription.para: Create a 3D Description of a Tile overlap.

simplesect.para: A TTL_overlap_t describing in 3D the overlap requested.

briefdescription.para: Create a 2D Description of a Tile overlap.

simplesect.para: A TTL_overlap_t describing in 3D the overlap requested.

briefdescription.para: Create a 1D Description of a Tile overlap.

detaileddescription.para:
TTL_overlap_t for more information.
width
///< Overlap width in elements
height and depth default to 0

simplesect.para: A TTL_overlap_t describing in 3D the overlap requested.
